thread.title: Major gun retailer ‘Dick’s’ ends sales of assault-style rifles

title: Major gun retailer ‘Dick’s’ ends sales of assault-style rifles
text:
Major gun retailer ‘Dick’s’ ends sales of assault-style rifles 10:54am EST - 01:32 
Dick’s Sporting Goods said it is ending sales of assault-style rifles and high-capacity magazines in its stores, on the same day students return to classes at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School. Jillian Kitchener   
Dick’s Sporting Goods said it is ending sales of assault-style rifles and high-capacity magazines in its stores, on the same day students return to classes at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School. Jillian Kitchener  //reut.rs/2CNR2gK
